options.title: -c, --changes
options.description: like verbose but report only when a change is made

options.title: -c, --changes
options.description: like verbose but report only when a change is made

options.title: -f, --silent, --quiet
options.description: suppress most error messages

options.title: -f, --silent, --quiet
options.description: suppress most error messages

options.title: -f, --silent, --quiet
options.description: suppress most error messages

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: output a diagnostic for every file processed

options.title: -v, --verbose
options.description: output a diagnostic for every file processed

options.title: --dereference
options.description:
affect the referent of each symbolic link (this is the default), rather
      than the symbolic link itself

options.title: -h, --no-dereference
options.description:
affect symbolic links instead of any referenced file (useful only on
      systems that can change the ownership of a symlink)

options.title: -h, --no-dereference
options.description:
affect symbolic links instead of any referenced file (useful only on
      systems that can change the ownership of a symlink)

options.title: --no-preserve-root
options.description: do not treat '/' specially (the default)

options.title: --preserve-root
options.description: fail to operate recursively on '/'

options.title: --reference=RFILE
options.description: use RFILE's group rather than specifying a GROUP value

options.title: -R, --recursive
options.description: operate on files and directories recursively

options.title: -R, --recursive
options.description: operate on files and directories recursively

options.title: -H
options.description:
if a command line argument is a symbolic link to a directory, traverse
    it

options.title: -L
options.description: traverse every symbolic link to a directory encountered

options.title: -P
options.description: do not traverse any symbolic links (default)

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit
